response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be $12,000 to me. However, considering its importance to you, I am willing to offer it to you for $9,500. This price reflects a balance between maximizing my return and ensuring you receive a great deal. I look forward to your consideration. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 9500}
